edu.cuny.cat.valuation
Class UpdatingDailyRandomValuerGenerator

java.lang.Object
  edu.cuny.cat.valuation.RandomValuerGenerator
      edu.cuny.cat.valuation.DailyRandomValuerGenerator
          edu.cuny.cat.valuation.UpdatingDailyRandomValuerGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuctionEventListener, ValuerGenerator, Parameterizable, Resetable
public class UpdatingDailyRandomValuerGenerator
extends DailyRandomValuerGenerator

This valuer generator creates valuations drawn from distributions similar to the situation in RandomValuerGenerator, but the valuations are redrawn at the end of each day and the class allows you to store the parameters you need to initialize a conjugate prior. It also allows you to change those parameters within the JCAT's internal database as the game progresses.

Version:
$Revision: 1.11 $
Author:
Grant Cavanaugh
